content.raw:
I just setup Ubuntu 12.04 and ROS Fuerte on a 2011 MacBook Pro. I am trying to have Gazebo run on it but it is unable to run with a GUI. When I use gui:=false it appears to start ok. When I attempt to start it with the GUI I get the following error:

-----
    Error [Transport.cc:102] Unable to get topic namespaces in [50] tries.
    Error [Node.cc:68] No namespace found
    /opt/ros/fuerte/stacks/simulator_gazebo/gazebo/scripts/gui: line 2:  6399 Segmentation fault      (core dumped) `rospack find gazebo`/gazebo/bin/gzclient -g `rospack find gazebo`/lib/libgazebo_ros_paths_plugin.so
    [gazebo_gui-2] process has died [pid 6396, exit code 139, cmd /opt/ros/fuerte/stacks/simulator_gazebo/gazebo/scripts/gui __name:=gazebo_gui __log:=/home/dave/.ros/log/69a675ca-14c1-11e2-bdd6-3c075420f805/gazebo_gui-2.log].
    log file: /home/dave/.ros/log/69a675ca-14c1-11e2-bdd6-3c075420f805/gazebo_gui-2*.log

-----

The log file "/home/dave/.ros/log/69a675ca-14c1-11e2-bdd6-3c075420f805/gazebo_gui-2.log" is empty.

-----

uname -a
Linux ros_mac 3.2.0-32-generic #51-Ubuntu SMP Wed Sep 26 21:33:09 UTC 2012 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux

-----

Simulator Gazebo Version: 1.6.16

-----
Video Card: AMD Radeon HD 6490M - 256MB
content.html:
I just setup Ubuntu 12.04 and ROS Fuerte on a 2011 MacBook Pro. I am trying to have Gazebo run on it but it is unable to run with a GUI. When I use gui:=false it appears to start ok. When I attempt to start it with the GUI I get the following error:

Error [Transport.cc:102] Unable to get topic namespaces in [50] tries.
Error [Node.cc:68] No namespace found
/opt/ros/fuerte/stacks/simulator_gazebo/gazebo/scripts/gui: line 2:  6399 Segmentation fault      (core dumped) `rospack find gazebo`/gazebo/bin/gzclient -g `rospack find gazebo`/lib/libgazebo_ros_paths_plugin.so
[gazebo_gui-2] process has died [pid 6396, exit code 139, cmd /opt/ros/fuerte/stacks/simulator_gazebo/gazebo/scripts/gui __name:=gazebo_gui __log:=/home/dave/.ros/log/69a675ca-14c1-11e2-bdd6-3c075420f805/gazebo_gui-2.log].
log file: /home/dave/.ros/log/69a675ca-14c1-11e2-bdd6-3c075420f805/gazebo_gui-2*.log

The log file "/home/dave/.ros/log/69a675ca-14c1-11e2-bdd6-3c075420f805/gazebo_gui-2.log" is empty.

uname -a Linux ros_mac 3.2.0-32-generic #51-Ubuntu SMP Wed Sep 26 21:33:09 UTC 2012 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux

Simulator Gazebo Version: 1.6.16

Video Card: AMD Radeon HD 6490M - 256MB
